about_the_game:
Fragmented Echoes is an action-adventure RPG that merges the worlds of Sci-Fi, Fantasy, and Cyberpunk into a breathtaking multiverse experience. Begin your quest in a dystopian cyberpunk world and journey through countless dimensions, ultimately challenging the divine realm itself. Immerse yourself in a richly woven narrative, cutting-edge mechanics, and modern graphics that bring every detail of this chaotic universe to life.



Master the unforgiving battlegrounds with dynamic camera perspectives, switching seamlessly between top-down and third-person views. Your arsenal is your greatest asset—equip up to four unique weapons in quick slots, each offering distinct advantages in combat. Adapt your strategy on the fly by swapping weapons in the heat of battle, customizing your approach to each challenge.

In Fragmented Echoes, character progression is key. Level up, gather powerful loot, and complete quests to strengthen your character and uncover the secrets of the multiverse. Face off against epic bosses in intense, skill-driven encounters where strategy and precision are paramount.

Powered by Unity’s HDRP, Fragmented Echoes delivers stunning photorealistic graphics that bring the cyberpunk-inspired worlds to vivid life. Experience advanced lighting and shading techniques that elevate the visual storytelling, making every moment in the game a visually stunning experience.

Prepare to embark on a journey like no other—where the fate of countless worlds rests in your hands.

content_descriptors.notes:
Fragmented Echoes contains content that may not be suitable for all audiences. The game includes intense depictions of violence, including combat with realistic blood effects and graphic imagery during battles. Players will encounter scenes of intense conflict, including epic boss fights where strategy and skill are required to survive.

The game also explores complex and mature themes within its narrative, including dystopian elements and a dark portrayal of a cyberpunk world. While the story does not contain explicit depictions of sexual acts, it does feature suggestive themes and dialogue that may not be appropriate for younger audiences.

In addition, players may encounter content related to drug and alcohol use, as certain environments and characters within the game world reflect the darker aspects of the cyberpunk setting. However, the game does not include depictions of sexual assault, non-consensual sex, or self-harm.

Please be advised that Fragmented Echoes is designed for a mature audience, and player discretion is advised.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 (3.3GHz) or AMD Ryzen 5 1400 (3.2GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 4GB or AMD Radeon RX 470 4GB
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 (3.3GHz) or AMD Ryzen 5 1400 (3.2GHz)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 2070
  • Storage: 9 GB available space

short_description: Explore action-adventure multiverse, blending Sci-Fi, RPG, and Fantasy genres. Restore order from Earth, journeying through multiverses to the divine realm. With top-down and third-person views, experience stunning graphics, thrilling mechanics, and master unforgiving battlegrounds.
